mutants.code:
def optimal_lotus_score(N, s):
    ans = 1
    for i in range(1, (N - 1) // 2 + 1):
        res = 0
        (l, r) = (i, N - 1 - i)
        while r > i and l != r and (l != r + i):
            res += s[l] + s[r]
            ans = max(ans, res)
            l += i
            r -= i
    return ans

    return ans
